name: Squeeze Presets File
summary: Learn about .SPFX files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Presets enable users to save settings for common conversions. For example, a preset may include the parameters necessary to convert any imported video to a format suitable for YouTube, an iPhone, a PlayStation 3, or an Xbox 360.

SPFX presets can be imported by selecting Preset → Import... from the Squeeze application menu. Presets can be exported by choosing Preset → Export. The files are saved using XML formatting, so you can view them in any text editor.
You can go directly to the Sorenson Media Presets Exchange website by choosing Preset → Get More Presets from the Squeeze application menu.
NOTE: Sorenson Squeeze was discontinued in 2018.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
